root.name: Fist Puncher
root.description:
Return to the glory days of sidescrolling beat-em-ups, courtesy of developers Team2Bit and Adult Swim Games.
The sinister Milkman holds the city of Las Cruces in his nasty criminal grip, and itâ€™s up to legendary black belt neurosurgeon Dr. Karate and the rest of the Fist Puncher team to deliver old-school justice to the lawless streets.
